msbt.message: Hey there! Pretty great how pumped up everyone is today, huh? You gotta love Festivale!Morning-jog energy levels won't cut it today. If you're not sweating, you're not doing it right!

Confetti's not the only thing in the air. If you see a feather float by, grab your net and swing for the fences!I'm challenging myself to a feather- catching contest. So far, I'm in the lead, but I'm right on my tail!

OK, I know how this is gonna sound, but I'm trying to figure out which feather color is the heaviest.I have most of 'em. I'm only missing .If you catch one and you can spare it, sprint by, and maybe we can do some trading, .
Flashy outfits help you stand out, which means more eyes on your rippling abs. No complaints here.Nothing to stop you from wearing it every day either. It's always a good time for dance cardio, !
You're looking buff in that outfit, . I'm easily your biggest rival though.It takes perfectly balanced triceps and biceps to pull this look off. Needless to sayI'm rocking it.
That Pavé sure knows how to move. It's easy to get distracted, but don't forget dancers are beasts too.I bet he's got a full six-pack and quads for days under all those fancy sequins
Having fun, ? Today's Festivale, so you've gotta dance like you're lifting weights!I don't exactly know what that means, but do that today, and your hamstrings will thank you tomorrow.
Netted any rainbow feathers yet? I've been on the lookout, but so far, no luck, .Whenever I spot one, I do a victory dance, grab my net, andit's gone. I should really work on my approach.
Check out my dance moves! My footwork is superb, and my musculature speaks for itself. The plan is to dance all day long. See if you can keep up! It'll be fun, !
A whole day of chasing after feathers and dancing Festivale makes for an amazing workout! Trying to spot the feathers pumps up your eyes too. Eye muscles are a waaay under-pumped muscle group.
Festivale has arrived! I can't wait to dance until my feet fall off. Or maybe just until I hit my step-count target.Follow me, and we'll get this island groovin'! No better time than now!
My PASSION knows no bounds! If you can keep up with my lightning- fast pace, we'll win the day for sure!
Hope you've been pacing yourself. Nighttime is when the champs come out to play!I've still got plenty in the tank, so if you need some fitspiration, look no further.
Everyone's dancing their hearts out. You can almost smell their effort from in here!Oh no Now that effort's all up in my nose, I'm finding it hard to stay still, !
If you're gonna go all out with the dancingand I know you are be sure to rest now and then.After all, Festivale is more of a marathon than a sprint. That means you've gotta pace yourself!
Listen, Champ. As your Buffness Coach, I want you to know it's important to take breaks.Use that time to work on posing. If you don't nail the poses, your dancing will suffer. Your gains too!

I've been doing secret training after my normal training to try and catch up to Pavé in dancing, butno dice.He's on another level. It's like his hips have hips! Wait, would that even help? I dunno, but he's THAT good!
Hey! Have you scored any of those cool rainbow feathers yet?They're rare, but just like those hard- to-pump rear delts, they're worth the extra effort, .
What a great start to the day! I've been raring to go for weeks now.I know I'm in tip-top shape, but don't let my moves intimidate you too much, .
Oh, YEAH! My muscles are all warmed up and ready to make some moves and take some names! In other words, it's time to unleash! I haven't been doing all this extra training for nothing, after all.
Nighttime is when Festivale really kicks into overdrive!And, hey, when it's dark out, no one can even tell if you miss a step or two, .
Long shot, but do you have ? I need one bad.Think I could interest you in my for it?
Let's DO IT!
That's a no.
Hey! Any chance you have ?You do! Cool! Want to trade for my ?
Sure!
I don't think so.
Great! I owe ya one. Let's get to it!
Ya really mean it? Hooray! Glad I asked!
Thanks, ! You're the best gym buddy a buff fella like me could ask for.
I knew I could count on you! Now my collection will be nearly as big as my biceps, .
Burn! And not the good kind that comes with exercise. That's OK. Just means I need to keep at it!
Awwww! That's a shame. Or maybe it's for the best? Yeah! Now I get to keep working for it, .
Let me get this straight That's of your for of my ?
Oh, YEAH!
No way!
